meanings.definition: A tropical plant with glossy leaves and small flowers.
meanings.sent1: The schefflera in the corner of the room brightens up the space.
meanings.sent2: I watered the schefflera in the morning to keep it healthy.
meanings.sent3: The schefflera whispered to the other plants, 'I'm the shiniest of them all.'
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a schefflera, radiant and full of life.
meanings.sent5: The schefflera's leaves shimmered in the sunlight, like green jewels.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the schefflera belongs.
meanings.sent1: Many different species belong to the schefflera genus.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the characteristics of the schefflera genus.
meanings.sent3: In the world of plants, the schefflera genus was known as the 'leafy family.'
meanings.sent4: The schefflera genus stood out in the botanical garden like a royal family.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the schefflera genus felt like diving into a green wonderland.
